hero.title: Transform your vision into high-performance mobile applications
hero.description: Having a high-performance mobile application is a real growth driver. At Numispark, we design and develop custom mobile applications that perfectly meet your business objectives and your users' expectations.

nativeApps.name: Native iOS & Android Apps
nativeApps.description: We develop high-performance native applications that fully leverage each platform's capabilities for optimal user experience.
expertise: iOS development with Swift and SwiftUI
Android development with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
Perfect integration with native device features
Performance and battery consumption optimization
Compatibility with latest iOS and Android versions
Compliance with Apple and Google design guidelines
nativeApps.conclusion: Native applications offer superior performance, better user experience, and complete access to device features, essential for complex or high-value applications.

crossPlatform.name: Cross-Platform Applications
crossPlatform.description: Optimize your budget and accelerate your time to market with our cross-platform solutions that allow developing a single codebase for iOS and Android.
expertise: Development with React Native for near-native experience
Flutter solutions for smooth and animated user interfaces
Maximum code reuse between platforms (up to 80%)
Simultaneous deployment on iOS and Android
Integration of native modules for specific features
Performance optimization for smooth user experience
crossPlatform.conclusion: This approach is ideal for startups, SMEs, or projects requiring rapid market entry while maintaining near-native quality.

uxuiDesign.name: Mobile UX/UI Design
uxuiDesign.description: We create intuitive, aesthetic, and user-centered interfaces to maximize engagement and user satisfaction.
expertise: User journey analysis and wireframing
Interface design respecting iOS and Android guidelines
Interactive prototyping to test experience before development
Touch interaction and gesture optimization
Adaptive design for all screen sizes
Animations and micro-interactions for engaging experience
User testing to validate and refine interfaces
uxuiDesign.conclusion: Our user-centered approach ensures applications that are not only functional but truly pleasant to use, promoting adoption and retention.

maintenance.name: Maintenance and Evolution
maintenance.description: We ensure the sustainability and performance of your application with our comprehensive maintenance and evolution services.
expertise: Regular updates for compatibility with new OS
Performance monitoring and continuous optimizations
Bug fixes and improvements
Development of new features
Usage data analysis to guide evolution
ASO optimization (App Store Optimization)
Responsive technical support and strategic guidance
maintenance.conclusion: Our flexible maintenance packages adapt to your needs, from simple technical updates to complete application evolution.

definition.title: Definition & Strategy
definition.description: We begin by deeply understanding your business objectives, target audience, and technical constraints. This phase includes needs and objectives analysis, competition and market study, MVP (Minimum Viable Product) definition, appropriate technology choices (native vs cross-platform), and development phase planning.

design.title: UX/UI Design
design.description: We design your application's user experience and interface with detailed wireframes, optimized user journeys, interface design respecting each platform's guidelines, interactive prototypes for validation, and preliminary user testing.

development.title: Agile Development
development.description: We develop your application iteratively with regular demonstrations. Our approach includes robust and scalable technical architecture, frontend and backend development, priority feature integration, continuous unit and integration testing, as well as regular demonstrations and adjustments.

testing.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
testing.description: We guarantee your application's quality with rigorous testing: functional tests on all target devices, performance and optimization tests, security and data protection tests, real user testing, then corrections and optimizations.

deployment.title: Deployment & Follow-up
deployment.description: We ensure successful launch and follow-up of your application with App Store and Google Play listing preparation, ASO optimization for visibility, Apple/Google validation process management, analytics and monitoring tools setup, post-launch technical support, and user feedback analysis with iterations.

ecommerce.name: E-commerce & Retail Applications
ecommerce.description: Transform your online store with a mobile application offering a smooth and personalized shopping experience.

business.name: Enterprise & B2B Applications
business.description: Optimize your business processes with custom applications for your employees or professional clients.

marketplace.name: Service & Marketplace Applications
marketplace.description: Create new business opportunities with connecting platforms and services.

innovative.name: Innovative & IoT Applications
innovative.description: Explore new territories with applications connecting smart objects and immersive experiences.

expertise.title: Advanced Technical Expertise
expertise.description: Our team of senior developers masters the latest technologies and mobile development best practices for high-performance and scalable applications.

userCentric.title: User-Centered Approach
userCentric.description: We place user experience at the heart of our approach, ensuring intuitive and engaging applications that meet your users' real expectations.

transparency.title: Transparent Methodology
transparency.description: Our agile process involves you at every step, with regular demonstrations, precise progress tracking, and clear communication on technical choices.

business.title: Business Vision
business.description: We don't just develop applications, we create strategic tools aligned with your business objectives, with particular attention to ROI.

support.title: Complete Support
support.description: From initial design to long-term maintenance, we support you at every stage of your application's life, guaranteeing a lasting partnership.

taskers.name: Taskers App Development
taskers.content: TaskerS task management application. Boost your productivity with our task management application. Organize your tasks, set priorities, and accomplish more in less time.
taskers.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express

aviators.name: Aviator App Development
aviators.content: The development of Aviator's Oasis focused on a smooth user experience, combining functionality with a visually appealing interface. Users can easily explore various options, such as forums to discuss flight experiences, galleries to share photos, and real-time flight tracking.
aviators.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express

wiefly.name: Wiefly App Development
wiefly.content: Wiefly travel booking application. Book your flights with ease using our flight booking application. Explore a world of destinations, find the best deals, and embark on your next adventure hassle-free.
wiefly.backendDevelopment: Backend Development with Node.js and Express

cost.question: What is the cost of developing a mobile application?
cost.answer: The cost varies considerably depending on complexity, features, and target platforms. A simple MVP can start around €10,000, while a complex multi-platform application with advanced backend can represent an investment of €50,000 or more. We offer phased approaches to spread the investment and progressively validate the concept.

timeline.question: How long does it take to develop a mobile application?
timeline.answer: Typical timelines vary from 1-2 months for an MVP to 3-5 months for a complete multi-platform application. Our agile approach allows delivering incremental functional versions, with a first testable version generally available within 2-4 weeks after project launch.

nativeVsCross.question: What is the difference between a native and cross-platform application?
nativeVsCross.answer: Native applications are developed specifically for iOS or Android, offering optimal performance and complete access to device features. Cross-platform solutions (React Native, Flutter) allow developing a single codebase for both platforms, reducing costs and timelines. We recommend the most appropriate approach based on your project, budget, and priorities.

security.question: How do you ensure data security in your applications?
security.answer: Security is an absolute priority. We implement best practices: sensitive data encryption, secure authentication (OAuth 2.0, JWT), protection against SQL injections and XSS, GDPR compliance, regular security audits, and proactive updates against new vulnerabilities.

storePublishing.question: How do you handle publishing on stores (App Store and Google Play)?
storePublishing.answer: We handle the entire publishing process: asset preparation (icons, screenshots), ASO-optimized description writing, product listing configuration, store submission, and validation feedback management. We also guide you in creating developer accounts if necessary.

maintenance.question: Do you offer maintenance services after launch?
maintenance.answer: Yes, we offer several maintenance packages adapted to your needs: technical maintenance (bug fixes, compatibility with new OS), evolutionary maintenance (new features), and user support. Our maintenance contracts start from €500/month and include guaranteed response time and regular reports.

integration.question: How do you integrate my application with my existing systems?
integration.answer: We develop secure APIs and connectors allowing seamless integration with your existing systems (CRM, ERP, e-commerce, etc.). Our expertise in backend development and systems integration allows us to create solutions consistent with your current technical ecosystem.

success.question: How do you measure the success of a mobile application?
success.answer: We define relevant KPIs together (downloads, retention, engagement, conversions) and implement analytics tools to track them. Regular reports allow you to evaluate performance and identify improvement opportunities. Our data-driven approach guides future application evolutions.
